name: UpdateProxyRecord
description:
Update a proxy record within an organization.

Use this tool to update details of a specific proxy record for a given organization in Datadog.

parameters.name: proxy_record_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the proxy record to be updated.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the organization whose proxy record is being updated. This must be a valid string representing the organization in Datadog.

parameters.name: proxy_record_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing proxy record details such as id, domain, target_cname, status, message, and timestamps.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
